step.cmd: To start collaborating with family, friends, club, project team, etc. click the plus sign next to the user name on the top menu bar and select Create Personal Organization.

info.p: If the group already has created an organization, they can invite you to join. Tell them your Trello username.

step.cmd: Fill in the Name of your new organization and a Description, then click Create.

stepresult.p: Under My Org Boards, you'll see the boards you create for this organization, while under Other Org-Visible Boards you'll see boards created by the other organization members.

step.cmd: To change the logo and description of the organization, click Edit profile.
To change the Visibility of the organization, click Settings.

choices.choice: Private means the boards are not indexed, nor visible to anyone outside the organization.
Public means the boards are visible to anyone with a link to them and they are indexed by search engines. However, only the organization members can create and edit the boards.

step.info: Further settings (restrictions and security) are enabled if you upgrade to business class.
